pages.index: Welcome to AceArena - The Ultimate Poker Experience with Global Tournaments and Exciting Rewards +91-994-8554360 acearena@gmail.com AceArena Home Why are we Start today Advantages Tournament Welcome to AceArena Step into the ultimate poker tournament experience. At AceArena, we bring together poker enthusiasts from around the world to compete in thrilling and rewarding competitions. Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, AceArena offers a unique platform for all skill levels to enjoy the game and win big. Join the tournament Why Choose AceArena? Unmatched Poker Action Experience the thrill of high-stakes poker in our state-of-the-art virtual arena. Our tournaments are designed to provide an adrenaline-pumping experience with every hand you play. Global Community Join a diverse community of poker players from all over the globe. Connect, compete, and collaborate with players who share your passion for poker. Fair Play Guaranteed At AceArena, we prioritize fairness and integrity. Our advanced security measures ensure a level playing field for all participants, so you can focus on your game. Exciting Rewards Compete for incredible prizes and exclusive rewards. From cash prizes to unique trophies, AceArena offers a variety of incentives to keep you motivated and engaged. Get Started Today Join the Action Dive into the world of poker with AceArena. Sign up today and start participating in our exciting tournaments. Whether you prefer Texas Hold'em, Omaha, or other popular variants, we have a game for you. Enjoy seamless gameplay, robust features, and a community of like-minded players. Immerse yourself 01 Real-Time Tournaments Participate in real-time tournaments and test your skills against players from around the world. Our dynamic scheduling ensures there's always a game waiting for you. 02 User-Friendly Interface Our platform is designed with the user in mind. Navigate through our site with ease and enjoy a smooth, intuitive gaming experience. 03 Secure Transactions We provide safe and secure transaction methods to protect your personal and financial information. Play with peace of mind, knowing your data is safe. 04 24/7 Support Our dedicated support team is available around the clock to assist you with any questions or issues. We're here to ensure your experience at AceArena is flawless. Join Our Community Become part of a thriving poker community at AceArena. Engage with fellow players, participate in forums, and share your experiences. Together, we make poker more than just a game – we make it a community. Join What Players Say Top-Notch Experience "Playing at AceArena has been an exhilarating experience. The competition is fierce, and the rewards are amazing!" Friendly Community "I've met so many great people through AceArena. It's not just about winning, it's about connecting with others who love poker." Secure and Fair "I appreciate the fairness and security measures in place. It makes playing at AceArena worry-free and enjoyable." pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - How AceArena Protects Your Personal Information and Data +91-994-8554360 acearena@gmail.com AceArena Home Why are we Start today Advantages Tournament Privacy Policy Your Rights and Choices You have certain rights and choices regarding the personal information we collect and how we use it. These include: Access and Correction: You have the right to access the personal information we hold about you and to request that we correct or update any inaccurate or incomplete information. You can access and update some of your personal information through your account settings or by contacting us at acearena@gmail.com. Deletion: You have the right to request that we delete your personal information. Please note that we may need to retain certain information for recordkeeping purposes, to complete transactions, or to comply with legal obligations. Marketing Communications: You can opt-out of receiving marketing communications from us at any time by clicking the "unsubscribe" link in the email or by contacting us at acearena@gmail.com. Please note that even if you opt-out of marketing communications, we may still send you transactional or administrative emails related to your account or the Services. Cookies and Similar Technologies: You can manage your preferences regarding cookies and similar technologies through your browser settings or by using the options provided in our Cookie Policy. Data Retention We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide the Services, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. The specific retention period will depend on the type of information and the purpose for which it was collected. We will delete or anonymize your personal information when it is no longer needed for these purposes. Third-Party Services and Links The Services may contain links to third-party websites, applications, or services that are not owned or controlled by AceArena. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties, and we encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing any personal information. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at acearena@gmail.com. By using the Services, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your information as described in this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with our practices, please do not use the Services. Effective Date: March 1, 2023. AceArena is committed to protecting your privacy and providing a safe and secure online experience. We take the privacy and security of your personal information seriously and strive to be transparent about our data practices. If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please do not hesitate to contact us at acearena@gmail.com. We will do our best to address your concerns and provide you with the information you need to make informed decisions about your personal information. Thank you for choosing AceArena as your online poker tournament destination. AceArena Elevate Your Style with AceArena - Where Sophistication Meets Quality 8FM5+85G, Vattepally Rd, Sanjeeva Reddy Nagar, Teegala Kunta, Nawab Saheb Kunta, Hyderabad, Telangana 500053, India +91-994-8554360 acearena@gmail.com Navigation Home Why are we Start today Advantages Tournament Additionally Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms of Use © 2024 AceArena
pages.terms-conditions: Terms of Use - Rules and Guidelines for Using the AceArena Poker Platform +91-994-8554360 acearena@gmail.com AceArena Home Why are we Start today Advantages Tournament Terms of Use Tournament Rules and Regulations By participating in any poker tournament on the AceArena website, you agree to abide by the rules and regulations governing such tournament. These rules and regulations may be posted on the AceArena website or provided to you in advance of the tournament. AceArena reserves the right to modify, add, or remove any tournament rules and regulations at any time, and your continued participation in any tournament constitutes your acceptance of any such changes. Payment and Refunds To participate in a poker tournament on the AceArena website, you may be required to pay an entry fee. All entry fees are non-refundable, except as otherwise provided in these Terms of Use. If a tournament is cancelled for any reason, AceArena will refund the entry fees paid by participants in such tournament. If you are disqualified from a tournament for any reason, including but not limited to a violation of these Terms of Use or the tournament rules and regulations, you will not be entitled to a refund of your entry fee. Taxes You are responsible for any taxes, including but not limited to income taxes, that may be applicable to any prizes or winnings you receive as a result of your participation in a poker tournament on the AceArena website. AceArena will not be responsible for any taxes, penalties, or interest that may be imposed on you as a result of your participation in a tournament. Third-Party Links and Content The AceArena website may contain links to third-party websites or content that is not owned or controlled by AceArena. AceArena has no control over, and assumes no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites or content. You acknowledge and agree that AceArena shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with use of or reliance on any such content, goods or services available on or through any such third-party websites or content. Indemnification You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless AceArena, its affiliates, licensors, and service providers, and their respective officers, directors, employees, contractors, agents, licensors, suppliers, successors, and assigns from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, judgments, awards, losses, costs, expenses, or fees (including reasonable attorneys' fees) arising out of or in connection with your use of the AceArena website, your violation of these Terms of Use, or your violation of any rights of another. Termination AceArena reserves the right to terminate your access to and use of the AceArena website at any time, with or without cause, and with or without notice. Upon termination, you will no longer be able to access your account or participate in any poker tournaments on the AceArena website. Any provisions of these Terms of Use that by their nature should survive termination shall survive termination, including, without limitation, ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, indemnity, and limitations of liability. If you have any questions or concerns regarding these Terms of Use or the AceArena website, please contact us at acearena@gmail.com. pages.thanks: Thank You for Joining AceArena - Your Premier Destination for Online Poker Thank You for Reaching Out! We appreciate you taking the time to connect with us here at AceArena. Your feedback and questions are invaluable to our team. We believe that communication is the key to creating a strong and engaged community. Our team is dedicated to providing you with the best possible experience, and your input plays a significant role in shaping our platform. We're always striving to improve, and your voice helps guide us in the right direction. Please allow us some time to review your message. We aim to respond to all inquiries as soon as possible, usually within 24 to 48 hours. However, during peak times, it might take a bit longer. We kindly ask for your patience and understanding. Once again, thank you for your contribution. We're excited to continue this journey with you as part of the AceArena family. Stay tuned for more exciting updates and features! To main
pages.tournament: AceArena Tournaments - Compete in High Stakes Poker and Win Big Prizes Daily +91-994-8554360 acearena@gmail.com AceArena Home Why are we Start today Advantages Tournament Upcoming Tournaments High Stakes Showdown Test your mettle in our High Stakes Showdown. With a massive prize pool and the best players around, this tournament is not for the faint of heart. Are you ready to go all-in? Daily Turbo Tournaments Join our Daily Turbo Tournaments for fast-paced action and quick rewards. Perfect for players who love the thrill of rapid gameplay and swift victories. Weekend Warrior Every weekend, compete in the Weekend Warrior tournament series. Show your endurance and strategy over a series of games, with big prizes awaiting the top performers. Freeroll Frenzy New to AceArena? Try your hand at our Freeroll Frenzy tournaments. No entry fee required, just pure poker fun and the chance to win some great prizes without any risk. Special Events Sign up Sign up Monthly Mega Tournament Once a month, we host the Monthly Mega Tournament, where the stakes are higher and the rewards are even sweeter. Don’t miss your chance to claim the mega prize! Sign up Invitational Masters Our Invitational Masters tournament is exclusive to the top-ranking players on AceArena. Prove your skills and earn your invitation to compete with the elite. Sign up Charity Challenges Play poker for a cause in our Charity Challenges. These special events let you enjoy the game while contributing to meaningful causes. Win-win for everyone involved! Tournament Types Texas Hold'em Our Texas Hold'em tournaments are the most popular, offering thrilling gameplay and strategic depth. Whether you're a novice or a pro, there's a table waiting for you. Omaha Poker Dive into the dynamic world of Omaha Poker with our specialized tournaments. With more cards and more possibilities, Omaha offers a unique challenge for seasoned players. 50K Total Players Over 50,000 players have competed in our tournaments, showcasing the global reach and popularity of AceArena. 10M Total Prizes AceArena has awarded over $10 million in prizes, making it one of the most lucrative platforms for poker enthusiasts. 24/7 Availability Our tournaments run 24/7, providing nonstop poker action. No matter where you are, there’s always a game to join. 100+ Events per Month With over 100 events per month, there’s always an exciting tournament waiting for you at AceArena. Never miss a chance to play and win!
